Package dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.placeholders

Class MagicPlaceholders

java.lang.Object
dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.placeholders.MagicPlaceholders
public final class MagicPlaceholders extends Object
Registry and helpers for MagicUtils placeholder resolution.
